query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZEAITZSDT0005 ( MANDT , HOGI , CHARACTERISTIC , SEQ , VBELN , POSNR , MOWBS , CUOBJ , VALUE , APP_PROC_DATE , APP_PROC_TIME , APP_PROC_MSEC , APP_PROC_USID --, EAI_PROC_FLAG , APP_PROC_FLAG ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #HOGI# , #CHARACTERISTIC# ,'01' , #VBELN# , '0000000000' , '' , '' , #VALUE# , HEX(CURRENT DATE) , HEX(CURRENT TIME) , MICROSECOND(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) , #G_USER_ID# , 'C' )
